length outside off, de Silva once again goes for the slog sweep but misses altogether as the ball turns, wasn't far away from the off stump

Raza strikes again for Zimbabwe, just at the stroke of lunch. Was shorter in length this time, Dhananjaya rocked back to pull but it kept low and sneaked under to crash into the stumps. An overbalanced Dhananjaya ends up on his back side
fuller around off, pushes it towards cover-point
fuller on the stumps, swept towards short fine leg
length ball around off, looks to defend but gets an inside edge on the leg side
floated full and outside off, front-foot drive to mid-off
short and wide, scythed to deep point
good-length awayswinger, drags Mathews forward and beats the outside edge

Raza wheels away after bagging a five-wicket haul. Low full-toss, slides in from round the stumps, Dickwella dares to sweep from the stumps. Too full for that shot and he misses it. It has straightened enough and SL lose their sixth wicket
shorter and skids in from over the stumps to ping the thigh pad
tossed outside off, guided off the face to point
full offbreak, defended
left alone outside off
wide of the crease, pitched up and outside off, patted to the covers
on the pads, picked off in front of square off the back foot
spared onto the pads once again, tickled away fine on its way for a double
back of a length and spinning into middle and leg, Lakmal is on the back foot, whipping through the gap at midwicket
back of a length and skidding in at off stump, punched to the covers off the back foot
full and hung up wide of off, Lakmal throws his bat at a drive...and misses by a big margin
back of a length on middle and leg, worked straight to midwicket
pitched up and outside off, clipped to mid-on off the front foot
sliding into the pads, deflected away fine past the keeper
floated up on off, nudged with the break through midwicket
tossed up outside off, looks to push but is early into the shot and ends up chipping it starigt to short mid-on
dug in short and down the leg side, Mathews, having shuffled across off stump, awkwardly fends at it and nicks it down the leg side to the keeper. Big wicket for Mumba and Zimbabwe
much fuller and pushed down the leg side, away from the reach of the flick
full and outside off, pushes out with hard hands and edges it, threading the cordon for a fortunate four
back of a length and slanting in at off stump, Fernando defends off the back foot
well-directed lifter on middle, Fernando ducks under it
much fuller and veering down the leg side, left alone by Fernando
flighted on middle and leg, forward and jabbed through the midwicket region
speared on middle, dead-batted away
flighted on off, blocked on the front foot
on a length on off, non-turner, defended
pushed through on off stump, Embuldeniya keeps it out
Raza gives this more air and gets it to break away sharply outside off, defeating the outside edge
nice and full, angling in on middle, Fernando keeps back and jams it out to cover
dug in short and wide outside off, Fernando does not go after it and instead leaves it be
pitched up and nibbling away outside off, no shot again
left alone outside off again
full on middle, defended back
shorter and spins away outside off, glided wide of short third man
pushed through on middle and leg, clipped around the corner
nice and full, breaks back in sharply, cramps the batsman for room. Inside-edged onto the thigh
floated on middle, Fernando runs down the track and drills it over mid-off
turn and bounce outside off, skips past the outside edge
full and outside off, ignored
back of a length and holds its line outside off, Fernando reaches out with hard hands and edges between third slip and gully
short and slanting into the body, shuffles across and works it away in front of square
good length and swerving away outside off, Embuldeniya plays inside the line and lets it go
overpitched and outside off, driven through the line, but the man at short cover flings to his left and intercepts the ball
pitched up and homing away outside off with the angle, Embuldeniya lets it go
looped up and on off, prodded back to the bowler
shorter and turns back in, punched back to the bowler off the back foot
slower through the air and spins in, dead-batted to the leg side
shorter and breaks in at off, blocked off the back foot
full and darted down the leg side, no shot from Fernando

dropped at first slip by Taylor, Raza's reaction suggests it was a miss. Looped up and drifts away outside off, catches the outside edge, but replays indicate that it does not carry to the slip fielder
back of a length and angling across off, Embuldeniya pushes the ball to short cover
full and skipping away outside off, Embuldeniya shoulders arms
back of a length and on off stump, blocked off the back foot
pitched up and outside off, Embuldeniya rocks forward and strokes it to extra-cover
lifter from around the wicket, aimed at Embuldeniya's head, he rocks out of the way
follows the bouncer with a slower cutter that beats the outside edge comfortably
short and spins back in sharply, an inside edge saves the batsman as he aims to defend off the back foot
flatter and faster on off, defended off the front foot now
tossed outside off and drifts away, Fernando dares to drive and sends a thick outside edge past the right of slip
on a length and outside off, Embuldeniya has a big swipe at this...and misses
non-turner on off, poked out to gully
tossed up and holds its line outside off, tapped to extra-cover

on a length and jagging away outside off, tapped to point. There's an awful mix-up between the wickets but SL get away with that. Both men are stranded near the middle of the pitch, for a moment both men run towards the striker's end. Chakabva runs in, gathers the throw, but can't hit the stumps. Fernando returns to the safety of his crease in the end
shorter and outside off, Fernando slaps it away behind point and gets four
short and outside off, tipped to cover
back of a length and angling in on middle, played back
pitched up on off stump, squeezed towards mid-on off the front foot
full and attacking the stumps, tapped back to Tiripano
fuller around off, digs it out towards extra cover
pitched up around off once more, pushed towards extra cover from the front foot
full, on the off stump, nudges it towards extra cover again
length ball around off and middle, goes inside edge but is not to the pitch of the ball, pushed towards extra cover
length ball outside off, slashes it towards cover-point
beats the bat. Pitching on off and spinning past the outside edge as Embuldeniya looks to defend
fuller outside off, left alone
almost yorks him. Jams his bat at it and misses. And it beats everyone. They get two byes as it goes goes past the keeper
short of length outside off, goes back for the cut but misses
a high full toss, looks to hit it hard but mistimes towards mid-on
length ball around off, much better. Pushed towards cover-point from the back foot
slower this time, some turn as well. Goes back to this length ball around off and pushes it towards covers
fuller on middle and leg, comes forward and blocks
short of length outside off, goes for the cut but short cover comes in the way
fuller on middle and leg, defended on the front foot

brilliant catch by substitute Mudzinganyama, Raza has got seven. Fuller on the stumps, skips down the ground and looks to go inside out but ends up mistiming it towards the left of mid-off where a tumbling Mudzinganyama takes it just above the ground
tossed up. Fuller around off, comes forward and blocks

chance of a run out but looks like Chakabva failed to gather it. Fuller around off, pushed into the covers and set off. Mumba fields and throws, it was a low throw, almost a half-volley and had Chakabva gathered it, that would have been the end of Sri Lanka's innings
length ball outside off, pushed through covers and they scamper back for the second
length ball around off, comes forward and dead-bats it
fuller around off, goes over wide mid-off and gets four crucial runs for his team
short of length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
flatter around middle and off, stays back and defends
and he survives. A length ball on the stumps, comes forward and blocks
length ball spinning in from outside off, cuts it towards cover-point
spinning way down the leg side, left alone
tossed up outside off, lunges forward and blocks
length ball outside off, jabs it on the leg side
flighted around off, comes forward and blocks
and they give him an easy single. Tossed up outside off and Fernando pushes it towards point from the front foot
fuller around off, hits it hard back towards the bowler who lets it through his hands. Fernando takes a single off the first ball
short of length on the stumps, tucked away towards short midwicket
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and blocks
fuller outside off, gets his bat in front again, the ball hits the inner side and rolls towards his feet
tossed up around off, defended from the crease
length ball around off, blocked again
short ball spinning in towards the off stump, goes back and looks to go aerial but it hits the toe of the bat and goes towards backward point
fuller around off, lunges forward and blocks
tossed up around off, pushes it towards wide mid-off for one more
length ball around off but too slow and Kumara adjusts to defend it
too full around off, gets low and looks to defend straight. The ball hits the outer half and bounces in front of silly mid-off
fuller on the stumps, comes forward and blocks
length outside off, spinning away from Fernando who leaves it alone
beaten! Tossed up outside off, Fernando comes forward to defend and is beaten by the turn
beaten again, with an even better delivery. This one pitched around off and middle and Fernando has to play at it. Turns away sharply to beat the bat
dropped short, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
tossed up at the batsman who defends it with soft hands, the ball rolls parallel to the crease
flighted on middle and leg, gets low and blocks
length ball on the stumps and spinning back to beat the forward defence. Was heading down though
length, pitching on leg and spinning down. Left alone
fuller outside off, lunges forward and blocks
length ball on the stumps, goes back and punches it towards wide mid-off
flighted outside off, stays back and chops it square on the off side
length ball on the pads, misses the awkward swat, off the pads towards backward square leg
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller around off, clears his front leg and smashes it over the bowler's head
fuller outside off, beats the bat with the turn as batsman comes forward to defend
fuller on the stumps, pushed back gently
and takes the single on the fifth ball. Fuller outside off, and driven towards sweeper cover
a full toss outside off, defended towards cover-point
wasn't far away from the off stump. Length ball outside off, Fernando looks to hoick it over the leg side and misses
length outside off, pushes it from the back foot, gets a thick outside edge past Taylor at first slip
length ball on the stumps, comes right over the ball and blocks
length outside off, goes back and punches, finds extra cover
Taylor signalled his bowler to toss it up and Raza obliged. But the line is wrong, on middle and leg. Defended from the crease
tossed up on middle and leg, pushes at it and gets an inside edge towards square leg
length ball on the stumps, stays in the crease and defends calmly
length ball in the corridor, left alone
short of length angling towards the off stump, stays back and dabs it down
length ball around off, stays back and defends
short of length around off, defended from the back foot
fuller outside off, looks to defend and gets a thick outside edge that bounces towards the gully
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
tossed up outside off, driven firmly towards extra cover
tries the leg spinner but ends up bowling it too short and down the leg side, Fernando attempts the pull but cannot reach there
fuller around off, comes forward and blocks
quicker one, almost a yorker at the stumps, Fernando does well to get his bat on it
tossed up around off, stays back and pushes it on the off side
a low full toss from around the wicket, Kumara pushes it through covers and they come back for the third
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks
fuller outside off, looks to defend from the front foot, gets a thick outside edge that rolls towards the gully
length ball angling in from wide of the crease. Blocked on the front foot

a great catch by Chakabva to end the innings. Was a length ball from wide of the crease once again. Fernando pushes at it without much feet movement. A thick outside edge, Chakabva was starting to move towards the leg side but flings himself to his right and takes it once handed

overpitched and just a shade outside off, Masvaure lays into it and drills it straight past the bowler for four. He shows off the full face of the bat and drives it with immense authority. Zimbabwe couldn't have asked for a better start
better length. Good length and angling in at off stump, dinked into the gap at midwicket for one
full and slanting back in from round the wicket, but the line isn't close enough to off to draw a shot from Ervine
shorter and holds its line outside off, Ervine punchily defends it to cover off the back foot
full and probing away outside off, no shot
back of a length and outside off, firmly punched to mid-off off the back foot
pushed through on the stumps, played back down the pitch
fired on off stump, defensively knocked towards midwicket
dangled up and breaks away outside off, turn with the new ball for de Silva, left alone
flighted and outside off, forward and pushed away to mid-off
speared on off stump, Masvaure blocks off the front foot
fuller on middle and leg, Masvaure keeps it out and closes out the over
shortish and homing in from wide of the crease, from around the wicket, Ervine belatedly swishes his bat away from the line of the ball and lets it go in the end
pitched further up and swinging away against the angle, Lakmal drags Ervine forward into a loose drive and beats the outside edge. Top-quality ball from Lakmal
back of a length and this largely holds its line outside off, ignored by Ervine
much fuller and outside off, Ervine tightens up and lets it go
fullish on off, Ervine deploys a solid stride and blocks
back of a length on off, tip and run to cover point
tossed outside off, chipped to the left of Dimuth at short cover
shot, Masvaure! Flighted and outside off, Masvaure gets underneath the length and launches it over mid-off. Away she sails over the boundary
full-toss on middle, whisked down to mid-off, who has now been pushed back to the boundary
fuller and flatter at off, played back to the bowler
flighted and angling in at middle, defended back to de Silva
full at the stumps, lashed away to long-off for a single
good length and holds its line outside off, no shot
full and heading down the leg side, grazes the pads and rolls away to the fine leg fence for four leg byes
back of a length and slanting into the pads, glanced away neatly behind square for a double
on the pads once again, diverted away square through the leg side
on a length and outside off, pushed through the line but only as far as short cover
back of a length on off, Masvaure gets behind the line and blocks solidly
tossed on middle, Ervine lunges forward in defence
flatter on off, guided off the face to point
fuller and spins away just a wee bit, poked out to point off the front foot
fuller and attacking the stumps, dead-batted away
full and angling into the middle of Ervine's front-foot defence
skidder outside off, left alone
back of a length and slanting into middle and leg, Masvaure falls over the flick and is beaten on the inside edge
on a length and angling in at off, whisked to mid-on without much feet movement
back of a length and slanting into middle and leg, worked through square leg
back of a length and on off, Ervine presses forward and blocks
on a length and swinging away outside off, Ervine shoulders arms wisely
on a length and slanting into middle, Ervine gets right behind the line and defends it carefully
back of a length and on off stump, forced off the back foot to cover
slower through the air, spins away, the dip creates distance between the bat and pitch. Edged past slip
floated up at the legs, Ervine ventures down the track and lifts the ball over midwicket. Kumara chases the ball and hauls it into the field of play
really full on middle, down the track and belted away to the left of de Silva for four
shorter and just outside off, Ervine responds with a back-foot punch to long-on
floated up at off, guided to the covers
back of a length and on a fourth-stump line, Ervine opens the face, gliding the ball to point
similar line and length, this is defended off the front foot
back of a length and holds its line outside off, Ervine shoulders arms
good length and veering away outside off, with that angle from over the wicket, no shot
back of a length and outside off, punched away between mid-off and cover for an urgent single
fullish and angling across, left alone
short and holds its line outside off, Ervine middles a back-foot punch to mid-off
back of a length and sliding into off stump, played back to the bowler
full and heading towards the stumps, Ervine's back-foot defence intervenes
full and skidding away outside off off the pitch, squeezes underneath the feeble prod of Ervine. Moral victory for Fernando
another one that barely bounces and moves past the outside edge. Ervine does well not to hang his bat out in the channel. He plays inside the line and allows himself to get beaten
short and at the body. Fended off to mid-on as Fernando starts off with a maiden
back of a length and just a shade outside off, defended off the back foot
good length and outside off, left alone
shortish and angling in at off, played back to the bowler
rip-roaring inswinging yorker from round the wicket, Masvaure just about digs it out
shortish and outside off, stabbed back to the keeper off the inside half
short and angling in at the top of off stump, Masvaure competently blocks to the leg side
good length and tailing in at off stump, Ervine solidly defends it back to Fernando

pitched further up and wider of off stump, Fernando lures Ervine into driving a fair way away from his body. He reaches out for the ball and snicks it behind to Dickwella. Fernando wheels away in celebration while Ervine drags himself off the field. Some respite for the tourists
on a length and angling away outside off, dabbed to cover with soft hands
on a length and veering away outside off with the angle, left alone
clipped off the pads around the corner for a single
full and moving away against the angle, Masvaure plays for the incoming angle but is beaten on the outside edge
back of a length and outside off, barely carries through to the keeper, left alone
good length and sharply angling in at off stump, Chakabva shuffles across off stump and defensively drops the ball to the leg side
on a length and on off, Chakavba shuffles across and blocks to the leg side once again
swinging into the pads, diverted away fine past the keeper for 4 leg byes
short on off, Chakabva shuffles back and across as he blocks to the leg side once again
pitched up and outside off, driven straight past the bowler for one
nice and full, straightens around off stump, dead-batted to the leg side
fired full at off, not quite a yorker, jammed back to Fernando
shorter on off, Chakabva resolutely defends
on a length and angling across off, Chakavba is caught in two minds: 'should I play or not' He belatedly pulls out but ends up deflecting the ball off the face to second slip
much fuller and outside off, angling away further, Chakabva fishes in the channel and is beaten on the outside edge
shorter and angling across off, played back down the pitch
back of a length on off from round the wicket, blocked to short cover
short and shoved down the leg side
on a length and speared at off stump, defended to cover
shorter and on off, Masvaure hangs back and fends it away towards point
Kumara hits a hard length on off, cramps Masvaure, and forces him to fend it to the leg side on this occasion
back of a length on off, played back, so Kumara begins with a maiden
length ball in the channel, left alone
short of length and going away from the batsman, punched off the back foot towards covers
length ball around off, stays back and blocks
length ball in the corridor, left alone at the last moment
length again, a touch further away, shouldered arms
length ball on the pads, flicked towards square leg
length ball outside off, gets behind it and blocks
short but down the leg side, Masvaure ducks under
fuller around off, looks to drive but doesn't get the timing right. Bounces towards mid-off
short of length outside off, stands tall and just steers it past gully for a brace
short of length at the batsman, was looking to pull but it hurries on to him, defended awkwardly in the end
angling on to the pads, tucked away towards square leg for a quick single
length ball around off, stays in the crease and defends
length ball around off, looks to defend first before deciding to leave. Too late and it dribbles towards the gully off the face of the bat
length ball on the pads, flicked towards deep-backward square leg for a quick brace
fuller and wider and he frees his arms. In the air but in the gap as well, gets a boundary to deep extra cover boundary
short of length around off, punched towards point off the back foot
short of length around off, looks to defend on the back foot. The ball hits near the slice and drops on the off side
short of length around off, gets on his toes and defends
short of length outside off, finds the cover fielder with the cut
short and pulled away fiercely towards the vacant deep square leg region, cracking shot that one
length ball in the channel. Shouldered arms
length ball angling in, comes forward and blocks
length ball around off, defended from the front foot once again
length outside off, goes for the cut but it spins in to take a thick outside edge. Just flies past the slip
fuller on the pads, turned towards short leg
fuller on leg, Chakabva laps it fine for a couple of runs
length ball around off, dabs it with soft hands
short outside off and spinning away, keeps quite low. Mistimes the cut towards extra cover who fumbles and concedes a single
length ball spinning big, goes back and away and pushes it towards cover
length ball in the corridor, left alone
length outside off, defended
length ball outside off, punched on the up and gets it through covers, Dhananjaya chases and flicks it just inside
length ball outside off, looks to hit on the up but mistimes it towards mid-on
inside edge on to the pads as Masvaure once again looks to drive on the up against this length ball around off
full and just outside off. Jumps away, beats him and rolls through to the wicketkeeper
short of a length just outside off, punched to sweeper cover
length on off stump, gets forward and stabs to short midwicket
full at the stumps, down the pitch and pushed back to the bowler
full on off stump, jammed into the off side
length on off, steps out and drives towards mid-on. Bowler leaps to his left but can only deflect it towards mid-off
full on off stump, solidly defended on the front foot
length and slanted into off stump. Watchfully pushed down the pitch
length and in at middle stump. Flicked to short midwicket with the angle
full at middle stump, pushes in front of the body for a drive. Trickles to mid-on off the inside half of the toe-end
length in the corridor, defended towards the cordon off the outside half of the bat
length on leg stump, clipped to square leg's right
short of a length just outside off, defended on the back foot
full on middle stump, shapes to drive and then taps it back down the pitch
short of a length and just outside off, tapped into the covers off the back foot

taken at slip! Lovely bowling from Embuldeniya. Just as much flight as the last ball, but a lot more dip. Draws him into driving once more but this time it lands short of a driving length and spins away. Makes him push weakly at it to draw the edge and a simple catch to his left for DDS
full at middle stump, defended to midwicket
tickled past backward short leg. Full and drifted down leg. Gets down on one knee and hits it fine. He's enjoyed attacking Embuldeniya this series
length and dipping outside off, turns away too. Left alone
length on middle stump, defended on the back foot
length and in at off stump. Blocked on the front foot
length in the corridor, blocked into the covers
length on off stump, defended into the covers
full on off stump, defended to backward point
length on off stump, defended to wide mid-off
length in the corridor, left alone
length and turning away outside off, left alone
reverse-swatted past first slip. More length and turning away outside off. Won't go at that with the drive to avoid the edge. Just whips it nonchalantly
full on off stump, tapped down the pitch
another reverse, this time a full sweep. Full and angled into the stumps this time. Meets it on the full this time
length on off stump, defended off the back foot
short of a length just outside off, defended on the back foot
length on middle stump, defended into the leg side
length in the corridor, defended into the covers
length on leg stump, pushed to short midwicket
looks like he is struck on the helmet. Yes, misses on the hook shot and it pings the left side of the front of his helmet. He's on his feet. Bouncer on a leg stump line and he was cramped on the shot
length at off stump, defended off the back foot
length at off stump, defended down the pitch
nearly trapped in front. Length ball doesn't quite go away with the angle. Plants the front leg across and flicks onto the pad
length and shaped down leg side. Past the attempted flick
length and just outside off, defended on the front foot
full and shaped into the pad. Tickled to fine leg's right
length and shape in again. Less of a stride this time to clip to fine leg's right
length on leg stump, thudding into the pad as he looks to flick

terrible cricket all around. Full and just outside off. Prince drives to mid-off's left and takes off for a run that is there. Taylor is looking at the ball the whole time, with his back to his partner while he runs halfway down the pitch. The fielder then fluffs the throw, getting it waywardly towards the cover region as the Masvaure runs back
length and just outside off, punched to extra cover's right and a tight single is stolen
length and angled into the corridor. Big stride across the stumps as he defends nervously and with hard hands
length in the corridor, defended into the off side
full and just outside off, left alone
length and in at leg stump, flicked to short midwicket
length and shape away in the corridor. Defended into the covers
beaten. Short of a length and rising outside off. A swish on the up
length and some shape away again outside off. Once again a swish on the up with half a stride. Off the toe-end into the covers
length and slanted in at the stumps. Pushed with the angle into the leg side
length and just outside off. Defended from deep in the crease
pings up off the inside edge but well short of square leg. Length and cutting in at him. Gets forward and pushes well in front of the body with a closed face
short of a length on middle, gets on the back foot and tickles to fine leg
length in the corridor, left alone
length and in at middle stump. Might have been a slower ball. Defended into the leg side
short and up at the helmet. Left alone as is goes down leg with the angle
inside edge to the fine leg boundary. Length and pushed wide outside off. Reaches out a long way to try and drive this
length in the corridor, defended on the front foot
full and just outside off, driven off the outside part, square into the off side
length on off stump, defended on the front foot
length and wide outside off. Left alone
length and wide outside off, left alone
length on middle stump, pushed into the leg side on the front foot
full on middle stump, driven back down the pitch
length and in at off stump. Defended with an angled bat, into the pads
length and in at middle stump, blocked on the front foot
length at off stump, blocked on the front foot
full and just outside off, mistimed drive to short extra
full and just outside off, half a stride out and whips it over square leg. Sweet looking shot
length outside off, jabs at this, away from the body
length and just outside off, blocked on the front foot
short at leg stump, fended down towards fine leg
short of a length just outside off, mistimed punch into the covers
overpitched and just outside off, driven firmly to backward point
short of a length just outside off, rising up in the corridor. Has a hack at it and gets a thick outside edge past gully
length on leg stump, clipped into the leg side
length and just outside off, sliced into the covers
length and angled into the pads. Drops the head into the off side and uses the pace to whip this past square leg
bouncer in the corridor, ducks to let it go
short of a length and in at off stump. Looks to carve that past point, gets an inside edge towards the cordon
length outside off, looks to drive away from the body. Off the inside half to mid-on
bouncer down leg side. Left alone
full at middle stump, pushed into the leg side
length in the corridor, defended on the front foot
bouncer at a leg stump line. Ducks that at first, then has a jab to try and ramp it over the keeper. Misses
length on leg stump, flicked to deep square leg's right
length ball around off, comes forward and blocks. Bat-pad it looks like. An appeal for lbw but denied

dropped by Vishwa. A length ball around off and spinning away, Taylor was nowhere near the pitch and ends up chipping it towards the left of long-off. Vishwa charges in, sprinting to his left but doesn't have a sure footing. Never looked like he was going to catch it, overbalanced when he gets his hand to it and spills
sweeps it behind square leg this time
uses his feet and drives it down the ground
slog sweeps it wide of long-on. Kumara from midwicket puts in the chase and just flicks it back, three more to Taylor
skips down and digs it out towards long-on
goes for the yorker, angling in towards middle stump from wide of the crease. Masvaure jams his bat at it
length ball angling in, stays back and blocks
length ball around off, stays in his crease and defends it on the off side
length ball angling in, looks to defend but the ball bounces behind the stumps off the face of the bat
length ball around off and middle, tucked away towards square leg
a maiden. Length ball outside off, taps it towards point
fuller on middle and leg, clipped towards midwicket

confusion in the middle and Masvaure is run out. A length ball outside off and spinning in big to cramp the batsman. He was looking to cut but the ball takes the inside edge and goes towards short fine leg. Taylor is happy with the one, signalling his partner to stay at the other end while looking at the ball. But Masvaure is also looking at the ball and charges down, almost three-fourths of the way. Embuldeniya collects the throw and breaks the stumps, the dive not helping Masvaure
fuller around off, defended
pitched up on the stumps, pushes it back
flighted outside off, mistimes the drive towards extra cover
fuller outside off, and spinning away. Left alone
fuller around off, defended towards covers
length ball angling in, watches carefully and leaves it alone
